hanzi-su-wiki:
擬

Значения

Уподоблять; подделка

Мнемоника

Если подлинность рук 扌 мастера сомнительна 疑, речь идёт о подделке.

Варианты

拟

to plan to; to draft (a plan); to imitate; to assess; to compare; pseudo-
планировать; составить (план); имитировать; оценивать; сравнивать; псевдо-
rtega_mnemonic:
擬擬RS
拟拟		draft, intend, plan, propose
  • hand 扌 doubting 疑 several plans: draft
  • ⓢ achieved by means 以 of a hand 扌
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 拟)
Pictophonetic: 疑 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
擬定 [ nǐ dìng ]: to draw up; to draft; to formulate
擬訂 [ nǐ dìng ]: to draw up (a plan)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 疑 [ yí ] to doubt, to question, to suspect
heisig_chinese_memo: Ask a mime to simulate doubt for you (i.e. do an impression), and he will no doubt scratch his head with his finger.
heisig_constituent: mimic, finger, fingers, doubt, spoon, sitting on the ground, dart, drop, heavens, chop-seal, hanko, zoo, critters
Keyword_KANJIDIC: mimic, aim (a gun) at, nominate, imitate
koohiiStory1: Ask a MIMIC to give an impression of DOUBT, and he will no DOUBT scratch his head with his FINGER.
koohiiStory2: I doubt you can mimic all these animals with just your fingers: http://www.google.com/search?q=%22Raymond+Crowe%22+Letterman (shadow puppets -- you´ll love it!).
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You try to use your fingers to cast doubt on people by using them to imitate each other. Right now you're using your fingers as finger puppets, imitating one of your friends to the others.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture your angry friend standing up next to your fingers, shouting, "I'm the real me! That's just an imitation!" The rest of your friends look nervously at each other. They doubt this person is real now.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Everyone thinks the friend you were trying to imitate is the imitation now and they have them in a guillotine (ぎ). You even doubt if they're an imitation or if your fingers are the imitation.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Okay, so that's a lie, Your fingers are definitely imitating them, but you don't want to end up in the guillotine so you keep your mouth shut.
Ru_Meaning: mimic, aim (a gun) at, nominate, imitate
Ru_Notes: Сравни: 疑 (うたがう、ギ подозрение, сомнение), 凝 (こる、キョウ застывать)
Ru_Radicals: 匕 (ложка), マ, 扎, 疋 (животные), 矢 (стрела)
Ru_trainchinese:
nǐ: (графема) сравнивать; подражать, имитировать; предполагать
nǐ: (глаг) собираться, планировать; составлять, разрабатывать (напр., план)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the hand (扌) you doubt (疑) is the one that does imitations
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: By means of your fingers you can simulate tons of different animals.  Kids know this very well.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " hand " and " doubt ", the original meaning is to guess and speculate. "Shuowen": "Degree. From the hand to the suspicion." "Yi‧Xi Ci on": "Prepare it and then speak, discuss it and then move." Kong Yingdashu: "When the sage wants to speak, the heart is intended to save And afterwards."

" Simulation " can mean analogy or similar. "Xunzi‧ Meticulous": "The beauty of self-expression is modeled on Shunyu, participating in the heavens and the earth, not an exaggeration."

" Imitate " also means to imitate or imitate. "Songs of the Chu‧Wang Yi"Nine Thoughts‧Resentment": "Revisiting Pengwu, and the second trace of Sixi." Original note: "Imitation, then also."

" Simulation " also means pointing and making gestures. "Zizhi Tongjian‧ Emperor Xiaowu Emperor Taiyuan Seventeenth Year": "The Huan family has lived in Jingzhou for many generations, and Xuanfuhaoheng... Taste Yu Zhongkan and listen to the pre-play horses, and use it to simulate Zhongkan." The phantom, lift it up, if it will stab it."

" Intends " has also expressed its intention; ready. "Book of Northern Qi-The Second Record of Emperor Shenwu": "Send the leader general Lou Zhao...and the provincial governor Gao Lung's plan of 50,000 troops to challenge Jingzhou."

" Intends " also refers to the development. "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty‧ The Biography of Gongsun Zan": "Guan Shao's plan will inevitably lead to chaos."

" Plot " also refers to drafting and writing. Jin Luji's "Wen Fu": "Thinking style originates from the chest, the words flow from the lips and teeth, and there is a lot of luxuriant flowers, only a few words."

" Simulation " also means transmission and degree. Tang Yuanzhen's "Born Spring" No. 10: "Where is the early spring? Spring is born with plums to help China. Ruipai is hard to commit the snow, and incense begs for the wind."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " hand " and " doubt ", the original meaning is to guess and speculate.
humanum_full_description:
從「手」，「疑」聲，本義為揣度、推測。《說文》：「度也。从手，疑聲。」《易‧繫辭上》：「擬之而後言，議之而後動。」孔穎達疏：「聖人欲言之時，心擬度之而後言也。」

　　「擬」可表示比擬、類似。《荀子‧不苟》：「言己之光美，擬於舜禹，參於天地，非夸誕也。」

　　「擬」也表示效法、摹擬。《楚辭‧王逸〈九思‧怨上〉》：「復顧兮彭務，擬斯兮二蹤。」原注：「擬，則也。」

　　「擬」還表示指向、比劃。《資治通鑒‧晉孝武帝太元十七年》：「桓氏累世臨荊州，玄復豪橫……嘗於仲堪聽事前戲馬，以鎙擬仲堪。」胡三省注：「擬者，舉鎙向之，若將刺之也。」

　　「擬」亦表示打算；准備。《北齊書‧神武帝紀下》：「遣領軍將軍婁昭……并州刺史高隆之擬兵五萬，以討荊州。」

　　「擬」還指擬定。《後漢書‧公孫瓚傳》：「觀紹所擬，將必階亂。」

　　「擬」也指起草、撰寫。晉陸機〈文賦〉：「思風發於胸臆，言泉流於脣齒，紛葳蕤以馺遝，唯毫素之所擬。」

　　「擬」亦表示傳、度。唐元稹〈生春〉之十：「何處生春早？春生梅援中。蕊排難犯雪，香乞擬來風。」
humanum_short_description: 從「手」，「疑」聲，本義為揣度、推測。

    • 疑 [ yí ] to doubt, to question, to suspect

①打算：擬去信聯繫。擬議。
②初步設計編制或起草：擬定(a。起草制定；b。揣測斷定)。擬訂。草擬。
③仿照：擬古之作。擬人(修辭方式，把事物人格化)。

擬字的基本解释

擬
nǐ
见“拟”。

擬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nǐ］
［《廣韻》魚紀切，上止，疑。］
“拟1”的繁体字。
(1)揣度，推测。
(2)比拟；类似。
(3)效法；摹拟。
(4)指向；比划。
(5)打算；准备。
(6)拟定。
(7)起草；撰写。
(8)传，度。
(9)诗体名。
(10)通“疑”。

擬字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　擬； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页460第17
【唐韻】魚紀切【集韻】【韻會】偶起切，?疑上聲。【說文】度也。【增韻】準擬揣度以待也。【易·繫辭】擬之而後言。【疏】擬度之而後言也。　又像也，比擬也。【前漢·公孫弘傳】管仲相齊有三歸，侈擬於君。【註】擬，疑也，言相似也。【後漢·張衡傳】吾觀太?，方知子雲妙極道數，乃與五經相擬。【集韻】或作譺。又作懝。【禮記】通作儗。【漢書】借作儀。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　倀; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 460-17
[Tang Yun] Yu Jiqie [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Occasionally cut,? Suspicious. [Said Wen] Degree also. [Add rhyme] quasi-predict and wait. 【Yi·Xi Ci】It is planned and followed. 【Sparse】Follow the degree of similarity.　It's like it again, it's like it. [Previous Han·Gongsun Hongzhuan] Guan Zhongxiang had three guilds, and he was extravagantly like a king. 【Note】Imitation, doubt, and similar. [Later Han·Zhang Heng Biography] My view of Tai?, Fang Zhi Ziyun Miao Ji Dao number, which is similar to the Five Classics. 【Ji Yun】or Zuo. Also made 懝. 【Book of Rites】Tong Zuo. [Hanshu] Borrow as a ritual.

Name meaning

nǐ
вм. 拟
Radicals: 扌, 疑  (fingers, doubt)
Meaning Mnemonic
You try to use your fingers to cast doubt on people by using them to imitate each other. Right now you're using your fingers as finger puppets, imitating one of your friends to the others.
Picture your angry friend standing up next to your fingers, shouting, "I'm the real me! That's just an imitation!" The rest of your friends look nervously at each other. They doubt this person is real now.
Reading Mnemonic
Everyone thinks the friend you were trying to imitate is the imitation now and they have them in a guillotine (ぎ). You even doubt if they're an imitation or if your fingers are the imitation.
Okay, so that's a lie, Your fingers are definitely imitating them, but you don't want to end up in the guillotine so you keep your mouth shut.
